overview_of_class: This course explores the nexus of innovation strategy and emerging platforms for market place analytics. Innovation policy is explored through the lenses of the intellectual property regimes and the associated portfolio of assets held by firms. Both proprietary (Patent Sight) and public databases (Espacenet, WIPO Brand Platform) will be used to analyze and consider management decisions for technology acquisitions, new product development, market trend analysis, product portfolio management, licensing and R&D Strategy. Partner firms that will teach and guide analysis contexts include Caterpillar and several member companies of the Berkshire Hathaway Group.
name: Innovation in Context
